org.apache.flink.runtime.execution.librarycache

类 BlobLibraryCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.execution.librarycache.BlobLibraryCacheManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    LibraryCacheManager

    public class BlobLibraryCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LibraryCacheManager
    Provides facilities to download a set of libraries (typically JAR files) for a job from a PermanentBlobService and create a class loader with references to them.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  BlobLibraryCacheManager.LibraryCacheEntry
      An entry in the per-job library cache.

      List of patterns for classes that should always be resolved from the parent ClassLoader, if possible.

      The blob service to download libraries

      Registered entries per job
      private FlinkUserCodeClassLoaders.ResolveOrder classLoaderResolveOrder
      The resolve order to use when creating a ClassLoader.
      private static ExecutionAttemptID JOB_ATTEMPT_ID

      The global lock to synchronize operations
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerJob

        public void registerJob(JobID id,
                        java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles,
                        java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Registers a job with its required jar files and classpaths. The jar files are identified by their blob keys and downloaded for use by a ClassLoader.
        指定者:
        registerJob 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
        参数:
        id - job ID
        requiredJarFiles - collection of blob keys identifying the required jar files
        requiredClasspaths - collection of classpaths that are added to the user code class loader
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs when retrieving the required jar files
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • registerTask

        public void registerTask(JobID jobId,
                         ExecutionAttemptID task,
                         @Nullable
                         java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles,
                         @Nullable
                         java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Registers a job task execution with its required jar files and classpaths. The jar files are identified by their blob keys and downloaded for use by a ClassLoader.
        指定者:
        registerTask 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
        参数:
        jobId - job ID
        requiredJarFiles - collection of blob keys identifying the required jar files
        requiredClasspaths - collection of classpaths that are added to the user code class loader
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs when retrieving the required jar files
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • unregisterJob

        public void unregisterJob(JobID id)
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Unregisters a job from the library cache manager.

        Note: this is the counterpart of LibraryCacheManager.registerJob(JobID, Collection, Collection) and it will not remove any job task execution added via LibraryCacheManager.registerTask(JobID, ExecutionAttemptID, Collection, Collection)!

        指定者:
        unregisterJob 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
        参数:
        id - job ID
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • unregisterTask

        public void unregisterTask(JobID jobId,
                           ExecutionAttemptID task)
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Unregisters a job task execution from the library cache manager.

        Note: this is the counterpart of LibraryCacheManager.registerTask(JobID, ExecutionAttemptID, Collection, Collection) and it will not remove any job added via LibraryCacheManager.registerJob(JobID, Collection, Collection)!

        指定者:
        unregisterTask 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
        参数:
        jobId - job ID
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • getClassLoader

        public java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader(JobID jobId)
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Returns the user code class loader associated with id.
        指定者:
        getClassLoader 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job
        返回:
        ClassLoader which can load the user code

      • getNumberOfReferenceHolders

        int getNumberOfReferenceHolders(JobID jobId)
        Gets the number of tasks holding ClassLoader references for the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - ID of a job
        返回:
        number of reference holders

      • getNumberOfManagedJobs

        int getNumberOfManagedJobs()
        Returns the number of registered jobs that this library cache manager handles.
        返回:
        number of jobs (irrespective of the actual number of tasks per job)

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        从接口复制的说明: LibraryCacheManager
        Shutdown method which may release created class loaders.
        指定者:
        shutdown 在接口中 LibraryCacheManager
